long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did You Know - Daily Facts


Discover something new every day! Get fascinating facts and insights with each new tab.


Welcome to 'Did You Know', the Chrome extension that turns every new tab into a journey of discovery!

Features:

Daily Dose of Knowledge: Each new tab greets you with an intriguing fact, ensuring you learn something new and interesting every day.
Sleek Design: Enjoy a clean, user-friendly interface with a modern look and feel, perfect for quick knowledge boosts.
Search Functionality: Integrated Google search bar for convenience, allowing you to explore more about the facts or anything else on your mind.
High-Quality Images: Each fact is accompanied by a visually appealing image, enhancing the learning experience.
Lightweight and Fast: Designed to be unobtrusive, ensuring your browser remains fast and responsive.
Regular Updates: Our database of facts is continually updated, offering fresh and current content.
'Did You Know' is more than just an extension; it's your daily companion for learning and curiosity. Whether it's a historical tidbit, a scientific fact, or a quirky piece of trivia, each new tab offers a chance to learn something unique. Ideal for trivia lovers, lifelong learners, or anyone who enjoys being pleasantly surprised by the vastness of knowledge our world holds.

User-friendly Interface: The minimalist design ensures that you get your daily fact without any clutter or unnecessary distractions.

Perfect for All Ages: Whether you're a student, a professional, or just someone who loves learning, 'Did You Know' is designed for curious minds of all ages.

Transform your browsing experience with 'Did You Know' and make every new tab a gateway to knowledge!
